											(Music) —
											crazy, long-legged woman
from San Francisco,
											got tired of this country,
and she wanted to get out.

Isadora was famous
somewhere around 1908
											for putting up a blue curtain,
											and she would stand
											with her hands over her solar plexus
											and she would wait,
											and she would wait,
											and then, she would move.
									,"

column12: con las manos sobre su plexo solar
A Isadora foi famosa por volta de 1908,
com as mãos sobre o plexo solar,
avec les mains sur son plexus solaire,
puis elle se mettait en mouvement.
für das Aufhängen eines blauen Vorhangs,
mit den Händen über dem Solarplexus

Josh and I and Somi call this piece
											"The Red Circle and the Blue Curtain."
											Red circle.
											Blue curtain.
											But,
											this is not the beginning
of the 20th century.
											This is a morning in Vancouver
											in 2015.
									,"

column12: Josh, Somi y yo llamamos a esta pieza
El círculo rojo y la cortina de azul"".
no estamos a principios del siglo XX.
Estamos por la mañana en Vancouver
O Josh, eu e a Somi chamamos a este peça
O Círculo Vermelho e a Cortina Azul"".
Isto não é o início do séc. XX.
Josh, ben ve Somi bu parçaya
Josh, Somi et moi appelons ce morceau
« Le Cercle rouge et le Rideau bleu. »
Nous sommes un matin à Vancouver
Josh, ich und Somi nennen dieses Stück
Der Rote Kreis und der Blaue Vorhang.""
Dies ist ein Morgen in Vancouver
